patthana3.10:1.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (yathā sappaccayaṁ kusalaṁ, evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
patthana3.10:2.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (yathā sappaccayaṁ akusalaṁ, evaṁ kātabbaṁ.)
patthana3.10:3.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:4.1_0: Anārammaṇaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:5.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ abyākatañca anārammaṇaṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:6.1_1: adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte ekaṁ,
patthana3.10:7.1_1: naadhipatiyā nava …pe… napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nava, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne dve, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:8.1_0: Sārammaṇo abyākato dhammo sārammaṇassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:9.1_0: Sārammaṇo abyākato dhammo sārammaṇassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:10.1_0: Anārammaṇo abyākato dhammo sārammaṇassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:11.1_0: Sārammaṇo abyākato dhammo sārammaṇassa abyākatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:11.1_1: Anārammaṇo abyākato dhammo sārammaṇassa abyākatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:12.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri,
patthana3.10:12.1_1: anantare ekaṁ …pe… sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye dve, purejāte ekaṁ, pacchājāte ekaṁ, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre cattāri, indriye cha, jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṁ,
patthana3.10:13.1_0: Cittaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:14.1_0: Nocittaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:14.1_1: Nocittaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca citto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:14.1_2: Nocittaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca citto kusalo ca nocitto kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:15.1_0: Cittaṁ kusalañca nocittaṁ kusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:17.1_0: Naadhipatiyā pañca, napurejāte pañca, napacchājāte pañca, naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, navippayutte pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:19.1_0: Nocitto kusalo dhammo nocittassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:19.1_1: Nocitto kusalo dhammo cittassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:19.1_2: Nocitto kusalo dhammo cittassa kusalassa ca nocittassa kusalassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:20.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava,
patthana3.10:20.1_1: anantare nava …pe… sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye pañca, upanissaye āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre indriye pañca, jhāne magge tīṇi,
patthana3.10:24.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana3.10:25.1_0: Cittaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:26.1_0: Nocittaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:26.1_1: Nocittaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca citto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:26.1_2: Nocittaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca citto akusalo ca nocitto akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:27.1_0: Cittaṁ akusalañca nocittaṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:28.1_1: ārammaṇe pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Cittadukakusalasadisaṁ, nahetuyāpi kattabbaṁ.
patthana3.10:29.1_0: Cittaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:30.1_0: Nocittaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:30.1_1: Nocittaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca citto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:30.1_2: Nocittaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca citto abyākato ca nocitto abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:31.1_0: Cittaṁ abyākatañca nocittaṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:32.1_1: ārammaṇe pañca …pe… vipāke pañca …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:33.1_1: naadhipatiyā pañca …pe… napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane pañca, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne pañca, namagge pañca, nasampayutte tīṇi,
patthana3.10:35.1_0: Nocitto abyākato dhammo nocittassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:36.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava,
patthana3.10:36.1_1: anantare nava …pe… sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe nissaye pañca, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke pañca, āhāre indriye pañca, jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca,
patthana3.10:37.1_0: Cetasikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:37.1_1: Cetasikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:37.1_2: Cetasikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko kusalo ca acetasiko kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:38.1_0: Acetasikaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:39.1_0: Cetasikaṁ kusalañca acetasikaṁ kusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:42.1_0: Cetasiko kusalo dhammo cetasikassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:43.1_3: sahajātādhipati) anantare nava …pe… sahajāte pañca …pe… upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre pañca, indriye pañca, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, atthiyā pañca,
patthana3.10:44.1_0: Cetasikaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:44.1_1: Cetasikaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:44.1_2: Cetasikaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko akusalo ca acetasiko akusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:45.1_0: Acetasikaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:46.1_0: Cetasikaṁ akusalañca acetasikaṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:47.1_2: yathā kusalanayaṁ evaṁ nahetupaccayampi kātabbaṁ.) (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṁ.)
patthana3.10:48.1_0: Cetasikaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:48.1_1: Cetasikaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.10:49.1_0: Acetasikaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca acetasiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:50.1_0: Cetasikaṁ abyākatañca acetasikaṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cetasiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:51.1_1: adhipatiyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca, kamme nava,
patthana3.10:52.1_1: naadhipatiyā nava (sabbe kātabbā) …pe… nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne cha, namagge nava, nasampayutte tīṇi,

patthana3.10:55.1_0: Cittasampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:58.1_0: Cittasampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:60.1_0: Cittasampayuttaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:60.1_1: Cittasampayuttaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:60.1_2: Cittasampayuttaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto abyākato ca cittavippayutto abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:61.1_0: Cittavippayuttaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.10:61.1_2: Cittavippayuttaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto abyākato ca cittavippayutto abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:62.1_0: Cittasampayuttaṁ abyākatañca cittavippayuttaṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana3.10:62.1_2: Cittasampayuttaṁ abyākatañca cittavippayuttaṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasampayutto abyākato ca cittavippayutto abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

patthana3.10:65.1_0: Cittasampayutto abyākato dhammo cittasampayuttassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana3.10:67.1_0: Cittavippayutto abyākato dhammo cittasampayuttassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:68.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā cattāri,
patthana3.10:68.1_1: anantare ekaṁ …pe… sahajāte satta, aññamaññe cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye dve, purejāte ekaṁ, pacchājāte ekaṁ, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre cattāri, indriye cha, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṁ,
patthana3.10:69.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:71.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:73.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:74.1_0: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:75.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ abyākatañca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasaṁsaṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:78.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:78.1_1: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:78.1_2: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno kusalo ca nocittasamuṭṭhāno kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:79.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:80.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ kusalañca nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ kusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:83.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno kusalo dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:84.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava,
patthana3.10:84.1_1: sahajāte pañca …pe… upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre pañca, indriye pañca, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca,
patthana3.10:85.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:86.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:87.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ akusalañca nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ akusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:90.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:91.1_0: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:92.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ abyākatañca nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:94.1_1: naadhipatiyā nava …pe… nakamme tīṇi, navipāke cha, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne cha, namagge nava, nasampayutte cha, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā cha, novigate cha. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:96.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno abyākato dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:97.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhāno abyākato dhammo cittasamuṭṭhānassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:98.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava,
patthana3.10:98.1_1: anantare nava (sabbattha nava), purejāte nava, pacchājāte nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava,
patthana3.10:98.1_2: āhāre nava (cittasamuṭṭhānamūlaṁ nocittasamuṭṭhānassa kabaḷīkāro āhāro kātabbo.
patthana3.10:98.1_3: Nocittasamuṭṭhāno cittasamuṭṭhānassa kabaḷīkāro āhāro ghaṭane majjhe kabaḷīkāro āhāro),
patthana3.10:98.1_4: indriye nava (rūpajīvitindriyaṁ ekaṁ), jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:99.1_0: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana3.10:100.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:100.1_1: Cittasahabhuṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasahabhū kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:100.1_2: Cittasahabhuṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasahabhū kusalo ca nocittasahabhū kusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana3.10:179.1_1: naadhipatiyā nava …pe… nakamme tīṇi, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṁ, naindriye ekaṁ, najhāne pañca, namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte pañca, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

patthana3.10:183.1_2: majjhe tīsupi sahajātādhipati), anantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe pañca, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava,
patthana3.10:183.1_3: purejāte nava (ārammaṇapurejātampi vatthupurejātampi), pacchājāte nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava,
patthana3.10:183.1_5: indriye nava (tiṇṇannaṁ rūpajīvitindriyaṁ), jhāne magge tīṇi, sampayutte pañca, vippayutte nava,
patthana3.10:184.1_0: Noupādā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:187.1_0: Noupādā akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:190.1_0: Upādā abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:191.1_0: Noupādā abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:191.1_1: Noupādā abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upādā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:191.1_2: Noupādā abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upādā abyākato ca noupādā abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:192.1_0: Upādā abyākatañca noupādā abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:193.1_1: ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe pañca …pe… purejāte ekaṁ, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme pañca,
patthana3.10:194.1_1: naadhipatiyā pañca …pe… napurejāte pañca …pe… nakamme tīṇi, navipāke tīṇi, naāhāre tīṇi, naindriye tīṇi, najhāne tīṇi, namagge pañca, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:196.1_0: Noupādā abyākato dhammo noupādā abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:197.1_0: Upādā abyākato dhammo noupādā abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:198.1_0: Noupādā abyākato dhammo noupādā abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:199.1_0: Noupādā abyākato dhammo noupādā abyākatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Paṭhame dvepi adhipatī, dvīsu sahajātādhipati.)
patthana3.10:200.1_0: Upādā abyākato dhammo noupādā abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:201.1_0: Noupādā abyākato dhammo noupādā abyākatassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:202.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare samanantare ekaṁ, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe pañca, nissaye pañca, upanissaye dve, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme tīṇi, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre cha, indriye satta, jhāne tīṇi, magge tīṇi, sampayutte ekaṁ, vippayutte cattāri,
patthana3.10:203.1_0: Anupādinnaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinno kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:204.1_1: ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Sabbattha ekaṁ. Saṅkhittaṁ.
patthana3.10:205.1_0: Anupādinnaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinno akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:207.1_0: Upādinnaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upādinno abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:208.1_0: Anupādinnaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinno abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.10:209.1_0: Upādinnaṁ abyākatañca anupādinnaṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinno abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—upādinne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana3.10:210.1_1: adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… purejāte dve, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme pañca,
patthana3.10:211.1_2: napacchājāte naāsevane pañca, nakamme ekaṁ, navipāke dve, naāhāre dve, naindriye dve, najhāne dve, namagge pañca, nasampayutte cattāri, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyā cattāri, novigate cattāri. (Saṅkhittaṁ.
patthana3.10:212.1_0: Upādinno abyākato dhammo upādinnassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana3.10:213.1_0: Anupādinno abyākato dhammo anupādinnassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.10:214.1_0: Anupādinno abyākato dhammo anupādinnassa abyākatassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati … ekaṁ.
patthana3.10:215.1_0: Upādinno abyākato dhammo upādinnassa abyākatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ. (Dve pañhā.)
patthana3.10:216.1_0: Anupādinno abyākato dhammo anupādinnassa abyākatassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo … dve. (Ārammaṇapurejātaṁyeva, ghaṭanā dve,
patthana3.10:217.1_1: ārammaṇe cattāri (upādinnamūlake dve, anupādinnamūlake dve), adhipatiyā ekaṁ,
patthana3.10:217.1_2: anantare samanantare cattāri, sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye pañca, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte cha, pacchājāte cha, āsevane ekaṁ, kamme cattāri, vipāke cattāri, āhāre nava, indriye cattāri, jhāne cattāri, magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte cha, atthiyā nava, natthiyā cattāri, vigate cattāri, avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
